unnormalised: Regarding the recent queries on KYC updates, kindly note that submission of your PAN Card no. is mandatory as per RBI guidelines. Also, ensure your IFSC code for the designated bank account is accurately reflected. For any assistance, please quote your Customer ID: 1234567890 upon contacting our support helpline. Failure to comply may result in account restrictions, effective 01/01/2025. We request cooperation to maintain seamless banking services.
normalised: Regarding the recent queries on K-Y-C updates, kindly note that submission of your P-A-N Card number is mandatory as per R-B-I guidelines. Also, ensure your I-F-S-C code for the designated bank account is accurately reflected. For any assistance, please quote your Customer I-D: one billion two hundred thirty four million five hundred sixty seven thousand eight hundred ninety upon contacting our support helpline. Failure to comply may result in account restrictions, effective first january two thousand and twenty five. We request cooperation to maintain seamless banking services.
